Thought Harvest.name: Thought Harvest
Thought Harvest.flavor: As your attack draws your enemy’s attention, you sneak through its mental defenses to see into its mind and discover its next move.
Thought Harvest.trigger: You hit an enemy with an unaugmented at-will ardent attack power.
Thought Harvest.effect: As above, but the target takes 10 extra psychic damage.

Open the Floodgates.name: Open the Floodgates
Open the Floodgates.flavor: You release all the emotions and thoughts you’ ve absorbed, smashing your enemies’ minds with a psychic flood.
Open the Floodgates.onHit: 2[W] + Charisma modifier damage, and the target is weakened and takes ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends both).
Open the Floodgates.effect: You shift up to 4 squares to a square in or adjacent to the blast.

Sleeper Awakens.name: Sleeper Awakens
Sleeper Awakens.flavor: Your eyes become white, and your corona flares. Your enemies are as insects to you.
Sleeper Awakens.requirement: The power Sleeper Awakens must be active in order to use this power.
Sleeper Awakens.trigger: An enemy attacks you or an ally adjacent to you.
